title: No Hablo Espanol - Leckere Burritos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Fast food, Delivery, Mexican, Tex-Mex, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small bistro (only few seats available) serving San Francisco style burritos, quesadillas and salads. Has a vegan, madrasi curry Indian style burrito - a fusion of Indian and Mexican flavors. All food prepared in-house daily using only high quality ingredients. Does not use food additives, artificial colorant or any other chemical. Does not use animal fat or lard. Does not use pre-packaged/convenience foods. Burrito boxes and salads are served in high quality organic biopacks.
